lyric:
[00:13.41]Red cups and sweaty bodies everywhere
[00:16.05]Hands in the air like we don't care
[00:18.95]'Cause we came to have so much fun now
[00:22.01]Bet somebody here might be the one now
[00:24.97]If you're not ready to go home
[00:29.80]Can I get a "Hell, no!"? (Hell no)
[00:31.80]'Cause we're gonna go all night
[00:33.69]'Til we see the sunlight, alright
[00:36.17]So la da di da di
[00:37.93]We like to party
[00:39.47]Dancing you and me
[00:40.97]Doing whatever we want
[00:44.88]This is our house,This is our rules
[00:47.48]And we can't stop
[00:50.47]And we won't stop
[00:53.73]Can't you see it's we who own the night?
[00:56.62]Can't you see it's we who 'bout that life?
[00:59.50]And we can't stop
[01:02.39]And we won't stop
[01:05.82]We run things, things don't run we
[01:08.76]Don't take nothing from nobody
[01:11.62]Yeah, yeah
[01:25.19]To my homegirls just tryin' to live it up, shaking it the like they can't they enough....
[01:31.07]Remember only god can judge us.
[01:33.46]Forget the haters,  somebody loves ya.
[01:37.16]Memories made 'til the nights through.
[01:40.12]Surrounded by the ones who love you.
[01:43.54]We all so turned up here, getting turned up...yeah!!
[01:48.25]So... La, di, da, di, di...
[01:49.92]We like to party.
[01:51.57]Dancing you and me, doing whatever we want...
[01:56.52]And, this is our house. And, this is our rules.
[01:59.51]And we can't stop.
[02:02.36]And we won't stop.
[02:05.80]Can't you see it's we who own the night?
[02:08.58]Can't you see it we who about "that life?"
[02:11.48]And we can't stop
[02:14.29]And we won't stop
[02:17.72]We run things. Things don't run we.
[02:20.68]Don't take nothing' from nobody
[02:23.61]Yeah! Yeah!
[02:25.03]It's our party. We can do what we want to
[02:27.80]It's our house. We can LOVE who want to!
[02:30.75]It's our song. We can sing if want to.
[02:33.72]It's my mouth. I can SAY what I want to!
[02:36.74]ohhhh.. Ohhhh ohhhhh ohhh
[02:47.55]And we can't stop.
[02:50.34]And we won't stop.
[02:53.72]Can't you see it's we who own the night?
[02:56.43]Can't you see it we who about "that life?"
[02:59.24]And we can't stop
[03:02.28]And we won't stop
[03:05.60]We run things. Things don't run we.
[03:08.41]Don't take nothing' from nobody
[03:11.58]Yeah! Yeah!
[03:13.37]It's our party. We can do what we want to
[03:15.70]It's our house. We can LOVE who want to!
[03:18.54]Can't you see it's we who own the night?
[03:20.59]Can't you see it we who about "that life?"
[03:24.68]It's our song. We can sing if want to.
[03:27.55]It's my mouth. I can SAY what I want to!
[03:30.14]We run things. Thins don't run we
[03:34.00]Cause we can't stop...
tlyric:
[by:啊啊七爷驾到]
[00:13.41]举杯欢庆，激情热舞
[00:16.05]挥动双臂，毫不在乎
[00:18.95]欢乐无限，乐趣无穷
[00:22.01]寻觅派对达人，调动派对气氛
[00:24.97]你若无归家之心
[00:29.80]就尽情狂欢吧
[00:31.80]今夜派对，风光无限
[00:33.69]彻夜狂欢，直至天明
[00:36.17]准备好，啦答嘀答嘀
[00:37.93]我们爱派对
[00:39.47]你我共舞
[00:40.97]随心所欲
[00:44.88]我们的地盘，我们做主
[00:47.48]我们无法停止
[00:50.47]我们难以停止
[00:53.73]夜晚属于我们
[00:56.62]生活由我们缔造
[00:59.50]我们无法停止
[01:02.39]我们难以停止
[01:05.82]是我们主宰世界，不是世界主宰我们
[01:08.76]做真实的自我，不受他人拖累
[01:11.62]耶，耶
[01:25.19]家乡姑娘，身材火辣，激情热舞，如临夜店
[01:31.07]记住！只有上帝有权力评判我们
[01:33.46]忘却仇人，我们会得到真爱
[01:37.16]彻夜狂欢，记忆终止
[01:40.12]被爱你的人包围
[01:43.54]我们欢呼雀跃，啊，无比开心欢腾
[01:48.25]准备好，啦答嘀答嘀
[01:49.92]我们爱派对
[01:51.57]和我动起来，尽情狂欢
[01:56.52]我们的地盘，我们做主
[01:59.51]我们无法停止
[02:02.36]我们难以停止
[02:05.80]夜晚属于我们
[02:08.58]生活由我们缔造
[02:11.48]我们无法停止
[02:14.29]我们难以停止
[02:17.72]是我们主宰世界，不是世界主宰我们
[02:20.68]做真实的自我，不受他人拖累
[02:23.61]耶！耶！
[02:25.03]我们的派对，随心所欲
[02:27.80]我们的派对，爱无界限
[02:30.75]我们的歌谣，毫无限制
[02:33.72]我们的嘴巴，话无阻挡
[02:36.74]噢噢噢噢噢
[02:47.55]我们无法停止
[02:50.34]我们难以停止
[02:53.72]夜晚属于我们
[02:56.43]生活由我们缔造
[02:59.24]我们无法停止
[03:02.28]我们难以停止
[03:05.60]是我们主宰世界，不是世界主宰我们
[03:08.41]做真实的自我，不受他人拖累
[03:11.58]耶！耶！
[03:13.37]我们的派对，随心所欲
[03:15.70]我们的派对，爱无界限
[03:18.54]夜晚属于我们
[03:20.59]生活由我们缔造
[03:24.68]我们的歌谣，毫无限制
[03:27.55]我们的嘴巴，话无阻挡
[03:30.14]是我们主宰世界，不是世界主宰我们
[03:34.00]因为我们无法停止···
